title: Many SAP users are still skeptical about S/4Hana and cloud ERP
text:
Many SAP users are still skeptical about S/4Hana and cloud ERP 
Published By: Computerworld.com - Today 
SAP placed a big bet on S/4Hana when it launched the new enterprise suite earlier this year, but users aren't so sure it's the technology th...
